name: Cristiano Arbex Valle
content: Cristiano Arbex Valle Cristiano Arbex Valle Lecturer Computer Science Department Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais Av. Ant√¥nio Carlos, 6627 +55 (31) 3409-1482 arbex [at] dcc [dot] ufmg [dot] br PhD in Applied Mathematics / Operations Research (Brunel University, London) MSc in Computer Science / Operations Research (Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais) Test instances for the order picking problem Test instances for the problems of allocating and sequencing racks and orders to pickers in a mobile rack environment Financial test instances for portfolio selection problems List of publications (Google Scholar) Brief biography Cristiano Arbex Valle is a lecturer at the Computer Science Department of UFMG (Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais), located in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. Dr. Valle completed his PhD in Mathematics at Brunel University, and his main research interests are Operations Research, Combinatorial Optimisation, Optimisation under Uncertainty, Quantitative Finance and Mathematical Modelling. He has a degree in Computer Science from UFMG and an MSc in Operations Research from the same institution.
